# Smart Agriculture Market Tracker - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
MERN stack application for tracking agricultural market prices with JWT authentication, admin/farmer roles, and AI-powered advice system.

## Tech Stack
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, JWT
- **Frontend**: React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Chart.js
- **Key Features**: Price tracking, weather integration, rule-based advice, forum system

## Development Guidelines
- Use async/await for all asynchronous operations
- Separate controllers, routes, and middleware
- Central error handling middleware
- Environment variables via dotenv
- JSON responses with {success, data} format
- JWT-based authentication with role-based access control

## Code Style
- Modular architecture with clear separation of concerns
- Comprehensive comments for complex logic
- RESTful API design patterns
- Dark mode support with Tailwind CSS
- Mobile-responsive design
